trans-unit.source: Represents the control that redistributes space between columns or rows of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Grid" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa o controle que redistribui espaço entre colunas e linhas de um controle de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Grid" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> control redistributes space between rows or columns in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>, without changing the dimensions of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> controle redistribui espaço entre linhas ou colunas em um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>, sem alterar as dimensões do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.

trans-unit.source: For example, when a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> resizes two columns, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> property of one column is increased while at the same time the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> property of the other column is decreased by the same amount.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> redimensiona duas colunas, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> propriedade de uma coluna é aumentada e, ao mesmo tempo o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> propriedade da outra coluna é reduzida pela mesma quantia.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows how to define a horizontal or vertical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> properties and by leaving the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> properties set to their default values.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir mostra como definir um horizontal ou vertical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> definindo o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> propriedades e deixando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> propriedades definidas para seus valores padrão.

trans-unit.source: **How to create vertical and horizontal GridSplitter controls**
trans-unit.target: **Como criar controles de GridSplitter verticais e horizontais**

trans-unit.source: GridSplitter type
trans-unit.target: Tipo de GridSplitter

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> value
trans-unit.target: Valor <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> value
trans-unit.target: Valor <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: Resizes rows
trans-unit.target: Linhas redimensiona

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Top>, <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Bottom>, <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Center>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Top>, <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Bottom>, <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Center>

trans-unit.source: Resizes columns
trans-unit.target: Redimensiona as colunas

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Left>, <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Right>, <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Center>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Left>, <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Right>, <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Center>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A> is greater than or equal to <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A>, this resizes the columns.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A> é maior que ou igual a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A>, isso redimensiona as colunas.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A> is less than <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A>, this resizes the rows.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A> é menor que <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A>, isso redimensiona linhas.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> can overlap a row or column that contains other content, or it can occupy a row or column by itself.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> pode sobrepor uma linha ou coluna que contém outros tipos de conteúdo ou ele pode ocupar uma linha ou coluna por si só.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to define a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>, see [How to: Resize Rows with a GridSplitter](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-rows-with-a-gridsplitter.md) and [How to: Resize Columns with a GridSplitter](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-columns-with-a-gridsplitter.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como definir um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>, consulte [como: redimensionar linhas com um GridSplitter](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-rows-with-a-gridsplitter.md) e [como: redimensionar colunas com um GridSplitter](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-columns-with-a-gridsplitter.md).

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> property settings do not achieve the desired <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> behavior, you can change the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> property settings.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> as configurações de propriedade não obtêm desejado <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> comportamento, você pode alterar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> as configurações de propriedade.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> may be obscured by other objects that are contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> podem ser encobertas por outros objetos que estão contidos no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A> coleção do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to prevent this situation, see [How to: Make Sure That a GridSplitter Is Visible](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-make-sure-that-a-gridsplitter-is-visible.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como evitar essa situação, consulte [como: Verifique se um GridSplitter é visível](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-make-sure-that-a-gridsplitter-is-visible.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de dependência para este controle podem ser definidas pelo estilo padrão do controle.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: Se uma propriedade é definida por um estilo padrão, a propriedade pode ser alterada de seu valor padrão quando o controle é exibido no aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: O estilo padrão é determinado pelo qual tema de área de trabalho é usado quando o aplicativo está em execução.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [padrão WPF temas](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to define a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> that resizes columns in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> by overlaying the edge of a column.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como definir um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> que redimensiona as colunas em um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> sobrepondo a borda de uma coluna.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to define a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> that resizes columns in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> and that occupies a column in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como definir um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> que redimensiona as colunas em um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> e que ocupa uma coluna no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum distance that a user must drag a mouse to resize rows or columns with a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a distância mínima pela qual um usuário deve arrastar o mouse para redimensionar linhas ou colunas com um controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" />.

trans-unit.source: A value that represents the minimum distance that a user must use the mouse to drag a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> to resize rows or columns.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que representa a distância mínima que um usuário deve usar o mouse para arrastar um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> para redimensionar linhas ou colunas.

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 1.

trans-unit.source: The minimum distance that is defined by <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.DragIncrement%2A> is reinitialized continually as the user drags the mouse.
trans-unit.target: A distância mínima que é definida por <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.DragIncrement%2A> é reinicializado continuamente como o usuário arrasta o mouse.

trans-unit.source: For example, when you drag the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.DragIncrement%2A> amount, the rows or columns are resized.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando você arrasta o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> pelo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.DragIncrement%2A> quantidade, as linhas ou colunas são redimensionadas.

trans-unit.source: To resize the rows and columns more, you must drag the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> the same amount.
trans-unit.target: Para redimensionar linhas e colunas mais, você deve arrastar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> o mesmo valor.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, changes to column and row sizes that are made by using the mouse or the keyboard to move the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> are made in multiples of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.DragIncrement%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, as alterações nos tamanhos de coluna e linha são feitos usando o mouse ou o teclado para mover o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> são feitas em múltiplos do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.DragIncrement%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: Nenhum

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.DragIncrement%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como definir o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.DragIncrement%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.DragIncrement" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.DragIncrement" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance that each press of an arrow key moves a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a distância pela qual um controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> é movido com cada pressionamento de uma tecla de direção.

trans-unit.source: The distance that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> moves for each press of an arrow key.
trans-unit.target: A distância que o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> move para cada que você pressiona uma tecla de seta.

trans-unit.source: The default is 10.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 10.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: Nenhum

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.KeyboardIncrement%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como definir o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.KeyboardIncrement%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.KeyboardIncrement" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.KeyboardIncrement" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates the implementation of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Cria a implementação de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> para o controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" />.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridSplitterAutomationPeer" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Um novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridSplitterAutomationPeer" /> para esse controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Called when a key is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando uma tecla é pressionada.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Called when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> control loses keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando o controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> perde o foco do teclado.

trans-unit.source: Information about the change in size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" />.
trans-unit.target: Informações sobre a alteração no tamanho do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" />.

trans-unit.source: Responds to a change in the dimensions of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Responde a uma alteração nas dimensões do controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> control determines what type of pointer to display after its <xref:System.Windows.Size> is set.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> controle determina que tipo de ponteiro para exibir após seu <xref:System.Windows.Size> está definido.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style that customizes the appearance, effects, or other style characteristics for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> control preview indicator that is displayed when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview" /> property is set to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo que personaliza a aparência, efeitos ou outras características de estilo para o indicador de visualização do controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> que é exibido quando a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview" /> está definida como <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Style" /> for the preview indicator that shows the potential change in <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Grid" /> dimensions as you move the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Style" /> para o indicador de visualização que mostra a possibilidade de alterar em <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Grid" /> dimensões à medida que você move o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> controle.

trans-unit.source: The default is the style that the current theme supplies.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é o estilo que fornece o tema atual.

trans-unit.source: When you set styles, there are some restrictions.
trans-unit.target: Quando você define estilos, há algumas restrições.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Styling and Templating](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Estilo e modelagem](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md).

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso do Atributo XAML

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: Valores XAML

trans-unit.source: One of the following: `StaticResource` or `DynamicResource`.
trans-unit.target: Um dos seguintes: `StaticResource` ou `DynamicResource`.

trans-unit.source: See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md).
trans-unit.target: Consulte [recursos XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md).

trans-unit.source: The key that identifies the style being requested.
trans-unit.target: A chave que identifica o estilo que está sendo solicitado.

trans-unit.source: The key refers to an existing resource in a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: A chave refere-se a um recurso existente em um <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.

trans-unit.source: Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended.
trans-unit.target: Sintaxe de elemento de propriedade é tecnicamente possível, mas não é recomendado.

trans-unit.source: See [Inline Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md).
trans-unit.target: Consulte [modelos e estilos in-line](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md).

trans-unit.source: A binding reference using or <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> is also possible, but uncommon.
trans-unit.target: Uma referência de associação usando ou <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> também é possível, mas não é comum.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: Nenhum

trans-unit.source: A preview of changes to row or column boundaries is displayed while the user drags the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> control, and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Uma visualização das alterações dos limites de linha ou coluna é exibida enquanto a usuário arrasta a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> controle e o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview%2A> está definida como `true`.

trans-unit.source: The column and row boundaries are set when the user releases the mouse button.
trans-unit.target: Os limites de linha e coluna são definidos quando o usuário libera o botão do mouse.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: O identificador da propriedade de dependência <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets which columns or rows are resized relative to the column or row for which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> control is defined.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define quais colunas ou linhas são redimensionadas em relação às colunas ou linhas para as quais o controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> está definido.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that indicates which columns or rows are resized by this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de enumeração que indica quais colunas ou linhas são redimensionadas por esse controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.GridResizeBehavior.BasedOnAlignment" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.GridResizeBehavior.BasedOnAlignment" />.

trans-unit.source: To specify a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> that resizes rows or columns, set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Para especificar um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> que redimensiona linhas ou colunas, defina o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: If you cannot achieve the desired behavior by setting the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> properties, change the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> default values.
trans-unit.target: Se você não pode obter o comportamento desejado, definindo o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> propriedades, altere o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> valores padrão.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Resize Rows with a GridSplitter](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-rows-with-a-gridsplitter.md) and [How to: Resize Columns with a GridSplitter](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-columns-with-a-gridsplitter.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [como: redimensionar linhas com um GridSplitter](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-rows-with-a-gridsplitter.md) e [como: redimensionar colunas com um GridSplitter](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-columns-with-a-gridsplitter.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: Nenhum

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como definir o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior" />.

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: O identificador da propriedade de dependência <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> control resizes rows or columns.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> redimensiona linhas ou colunas.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies whether to resize rows or columns.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de enumeração que especifica se é necessário redimensionar linhas ou colunas.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.GridResizeDirection.Auto" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.GridResizeDirection.Auto" />.

trans-unit.source: To specify a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> that resizes rows or columns, set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Para especificar um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> que redimensiona linhas ou colunas, defina o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: If you cannot achieve the desired behavior by setting the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> properties, change the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> default values.
trans-unit.target: Se você não pode obter o comportamento desejado, definindo o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> propriedades, altere o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> valores padrão.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Resize Rows with a GridSplitter](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-rows-with-a-gridsplitter.md) and [How to: Resize Columns with a GridSplitter](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-columns-with-a-gridsplitter.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [como: redimensionar linhas com um GridSplitter](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-rows-with-a-gridsplitter.md) e [como: redimensionar colunas com um GridSplitter](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-columns-with-a-gridsplitter.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: Nenhum

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como definir o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> control updates the column or row size as the user drags the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> atualiza o tamanho da coluna ou da linha conforme o usuário arrasta o controle.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> preview is displayed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se uma visualização <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> for exibida; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> requires an <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> object to be present in its parent tree in order to display drag preview feedback.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> requer um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> esteja presente na árvore de seu pai para exibir comentários de visualização de arrastar.

trans-unit.source: This requirement is typically met by the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> object that is available in the default style for the <xref:System.Windows.Window> or in the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> object that is created by a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> object.
trans-unit.target: Esse requisito é atendido normalmente com o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> objeto que está disponível no estilo padrão para o <xref:System.Windows.Window> ou o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> objeto criado por um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> objeto.

trans-unit.source: However, if neither of these is available, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> control must define its own <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> object.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se nenhuma desses estiver disponível, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> controle deve definir seu próprio <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: Nenhum

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview%2A> property is set to `true`, a preview of the change in the row or column sizes is shown.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview%2A> está definida como `true`, é mostrada uma visualização da alteração nos tamanhos de linha ou coluna.

trans-unit.source: The actual size changes when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> is released.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho real é alterado quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> é liberado.

trans-unit.source: If the property is set to `false`, the column or row sizes are updated in real time as the user drags the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> control.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade é definida como `false`, os tamanhos de coluna ou linha são atualizados em tempo real quando a usuário arrasta a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> controle.

trans-unit.source: If the keyboard is used to move the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> control, column or row sizes are updated in real time even if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se o teclado é usado para mover o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> tamanhos de controle, a coluna ou linha são atualizados em tempo real, mesmo se o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview%2A> está definida como `true`.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como definir o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview" />.
